entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Alliston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:50 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Egbert 01:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
Temperature: 3.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 84 %
Dewpoint: 1.3°C
Wind: WSW 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries after midnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 8:33 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:33 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 8:33 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
